customAmountOptions.message: provides meals and care for {{n}} people
customAmountOptions.messageSingular: provides meals and care for 1 person

customContent:
No one should be lonely or hungry on Thanksgiving.

Your gift today ensures that hot meals fill hungry souls who come to us for food, friendship, comfort, and guidance.

Mark is so grateful for the transformation made possible by donors who support Portland Rescue Mission. This Thanksgiving and Christmas, Mark has a new perspective.“There is hope in this world,” he says. “I’m thankful that I’ll never have to be homeless, that I don’t have to be alone anymore.”

Your donation today will provide urgent help and life-changing care.
